net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Class BinaryByteWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.AbstractByteWriter
      • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.BinaryByteWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IByteRecordWriter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteTextWriter, VbByteWriter

    public class BinaryByteWriter
extends AbstractByteWriter
    writes an Array of bytes as a line in a fixed line length file (i.e. all lines are exactly the same length).
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

    • Constructor Detail

      • BinaryByteWriter

        public BinaryByteWriter()
        create binary line writer

      • BinaryByteWriter

        public BinaryByteWriter(boolean includeRDW,
                boolean addRdwToLength,
                byte[] eolByte)
        create binary line writer
        Parameters:
        includeRDW - write RDW (record Descriptor Word) at the start of each record. The RDW consists of
        • 2 byte length (big endian format)
        • 2 bytes (hex zeros)
        addRdwToLength - wether to add 4 bytes to RDW length
